document.full_text: the bahrain formula one grand prix, postponed in march due to violent civil unrest, will go ahead on october 30 with india moving to the end of the season, the sport's governing fia said on friday.
document.title: bahrain reinstated, india to end season
lines_and_colors: the bahrain formula one grand prix, postponed in march due to violent civil unrest, will go ahead on october 30 with india moving to the end of the season, the sport's governing fia said on friday.
